raw_body: JAYASINGHE – SAVITRI. Former General Manager, Bank of Ceylon, wife of Edmond (ex-foreign service), daughter of the late Percy and Celia Vitarana, mother of Jayani, mother-in-law of Michael Alles, grandmother of Ayana and Sahan, sister of Anil Vitarana and late Lucky and late Menik, sister-in-law of Gamini De Alwis and Janaki.
